q1: Who is the keeper for Athletic Madrid?
a1: keylor is the keeper for athletic madrid.
q2: WHO IS THE FRONT STAR OF THE ATLÉTICO DE MADRID? ANTOINE GRIEZZMAN IS THE FRONT STAR OF THE ATLETICO DE MADRID.
a2: How much did Atletico Madrid pay for him?
q3: Athletico paid a the club record 30 million for him but now that he is staying it has turned into a great bargain.
a3: That man is seriously full of himself though.
a4: Haven’t you seen him in action?
q5: He is great in action. How does being great make him full of himself?
a5: he quite knows he is a big asset for the club and can do whatever he wants.
q6: Does that affect his ability to form relationships with the rest of the team?
a6: I don't really think so. He's a consummate professional, he wouldn't let that get in the way. Well, I've got to run. Goodbye!
